txt.en: 'Bones, stolen from Bregmor's corpse? And you are quite sure it was the work of this Karazgar? It is not that I disbelieve you, [placeholder], for the bones are missing clear enough, now that you have pointed it out. But out from under our noses!\n\n'This is a fell and devious foe you hunt, and I wish you all the fortune there is in your contest against him!'
You should speak with Fotri, who can be found in Forochel.
Fotri will lead you to the dragon Bregmor's corpse.

'You are indeed welcome here, and heartily! But what in the long leagues has brought you so far north?'

You tell Fotri that you are looking for the remains of the dragon Bregmor.

'Ah, I see. We keep close guard upon the dragon's corpse, but you do not have the look of someone planning any mischief or wickedness, so I will take you there... though under the watch of my wary eye, all the same.'
You should speak with Fotri, who can be found in Forochel.
'The bitter cold of Forochel has preserved the dragon marvelously well. Come, and you will see with your own eyes.'
